Name: Operation of material hoists.
Title: A Local Law to amend the building code of the city of New York, in relation to the operation of material hoists.

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings
This Introduction was Sine Die (Filed, End of Session)

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

Section 1.  Section 3317.5 of the building code of the city of New York, as added by local law number 33 for the year 2007, is amended to read as follows:
3317.5 Operation. Notwithstanding any other provision of law, material hoists with a manufacturer’s capacity over one ton shall be operated only by persons holding a Class A or Class B Hoisting Machine Operators License [except during installation, jumping, dismantling or alteration operations].

§2.  This local law shall take effect on July 1, 2008.

LS# 3625
